vote.title: Appointment of, Michael Stevens, Director of Development for the City of Columbus, 111 N. Front Street, Eighth floor, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve as a joint City of Columbus-Franklin County appointee to the Affordable Housing Trust for Columbus and Franklin County Board of Directors, replacing Sandy Doyle-Ahern, with a new term of January 1, 2024 until December 31, 2027 (résumé attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Appointment of, Michael Stevens, Director of Development for the City of Columbus, 111 N. Front Street, Eighth floor, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve as a joint City of Columbus-Franklin County appointee to the Affordable Housing Trust for Columbus and Franklin County Board of Directors, replacing Sandy Doyle-Ahern, with a new term of January 1, 2024 until December 31, 2027 (résumé attached).
